Keywords: Champions , Defenders , Jean Grey School For Higher Learning , X-Men
Real Name: Bobby Drake
Special Powers
RALLY (5): Opposing Attack Rolls. When Iceman makes an attack, after resolutions you may remove his RALLY die to give each hit character an action token.

Goop
I like him. For a double target incap and then remove the rally to token em again. You can shut down their biggest guns pretty hard with him alone as long as you can keep rally die going. Good attack values and a taxi too for only 45pts.
